desc: The Sarah Moore Greene Parent-Teacher Organization is a PTO whose primary objective is to support the students and teachers of the Sarah Moore Greene Magnet Academy. We support SMGMA through our time, fundraising, and cooperation with the school's administration and staff.

layout.text:
Our mission is to support the students and teachers of Sarah Moore Greene Magnet Academy to ensure they have the resources to excel inside and outside of the classroom every day.
Join us on Facebook at our Parent Group!
